content.text:
<task>
src/app/api/openrouter/[...path]/route.ts:151-160
```
function makeProxiedResponseHeaders(headers: Headers) {
  const outputHeaders = new Headers();
  for (const headerKey of ['date', 'content-type', 'request-id']) {
    const value = headers.get(headerKey);
    if (value) {
      outputHeaders.set(headerKey, value);
    }
  }
  return outputHeaders;
}
```

Can this be simplified, somehow?
</task>
